character.name: Stan
character.design:
Flavor Rave Original
Designed by Hisa
character.desc: A big fan of Sour who's been to all of his shows. He's not the biggest fan of classical music.

character.name: Moon
character.design:
Flavor Rave Original
Designed by Hisa
character.desc: One of Sweet's biggest fans, excited to see Sweet's first performance in her hometown.

character.desc: Self-titled 'Coolest Dude Around'. He has the uncanny ability to always appear in places where crazy events are happening.

character.design:
Flavor Rave Original
OG Design by Starbitz
character.desc: Her name's short for Saffron. A young kid from Sweet's hometown who loves arts n' crafts. She has an unusually strong disdain for Sour.

character.desc: One of the passerbys during Umami and Sour's performance.

character.name: Furikake
character.design:
Flavor Rave Original
Designed by Duster
character.desc: A singer from New Togarashi whose become tired of city life. She's taken her girlfriend out on a date to Central Togarashi's Speaker Gate.

character.name: Nori
character.design:
Flavor Rave Original
Designed by Hisa
character.desc: A singer born in Old Togarashi. She felt isolated in her old homelife but found comfort with her partner, Furikake.

character.name: Shuri
character.desc: A faraway traveler here to visit Togarashi Town's popular couples spot.

character.name: Ken
character.desc: A faraway traveler here to visit Togarashi Town's popular couples spot.

character.name: Citrus
character.design:
Flavor Rave Original
Designed by StariiFish
character.desc: A young girl who favors Enzync City's natural locales and brightens your day with her ukelele.

character.name: Herbal
character.design:
Flavor Rave Original
Designed by Lillian
character.desc: The owner of a quaint tea shop in Central Togarashi. Her teas are known across town to soothe the soul.

character.name:
Mazapan
￙
character.design:
Flavor Rave Original
Designed by NaNaaaoto
character.desc: A traveling dancer from Corianda who can perform for several hours at a time with no rest. Always carries treats to toss to their viewers.

character.name: Ramune
character.design:
Flavor Rave Original
 Designed by Mellodi
character.desc: Enzync City's upcoming idol star, lifting other's spirits with her hyper-energetic pop music.
